ruleSearch.author: writer
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
let content=JSON.parse(src)
//java.log(JSON.stringify(content))
 
 let list=[];
    Array.from(content.data.videos).forEach(x=>{    	    	
    list.push({
    name:x.name,
    last:x.uptodate,
    
    
    ty: [`${x.status} ${x.type} ${x.tags}`],
    
    introduce:x.intro,
    picture:x.cover,
    link:"https://api.agefans.la/v2/detail/"+x.id,
    original:x.name_original,
    writer:x.writer
})    
}) 
//java.log(JSON.stringify(list))
    list
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name
